b'@Catahoula_Value @colarion Can confirm from a friend that Carter Bank & Trust are closing all their regional branches in NC except for Mooresville, NC location. $Care'
b'Carter Bankshares price target raised to $13.25 from $11 at DA Davidson\n$CARE'

b'@colarion I believe that the market has under-estimated the magnitude of the bank\xe2\x80\x99s transformation.  The new executive management is seasoned bankers, and they have many levers to pull and buttons to push.  But they inherited a huge project; transition will take several years. $CARE'

b'@colarion For over 50 years, Worth Harris Carter, Jr., a soft-spoken commercial banker, had a large influence in rural Virginia and North Carolina.  He died at age 79 in early 2017.  Starting in 1974, he cobbled together a number of banks into an eponymous institution $CARE'
